title: My screen call option isn't available for incoming calls. Brand new Pixel 3 straight from Google, in
content: My call screen option isn't available for incoming calls. Brand new Pixel 3 straight from google. I live in TN, USA. Tried rebooting, checked that Caller ID and spam option was on, checked that filter spam calls was on. Checked with my friends for whom screen call works. Deleted the Hiya app that was brought over form my old phone. No luck...
